metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14348 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: libcgroup up to and including 0.41 creates /var/log/cgred with mode 0666 regardless of the configured umask, leading to disclosure of information. It was discovered that libcgroup incorrectly handled log file permissions. An attacker could possibly use thise issue to obtain sensitive information.

criterions.comment: libcgroup package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.41-10').
